description: Try our easy to follow Oysters Al Forno recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Oysters Al Forno Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine saffron and 1 tbs hot water in a small bowl. Stand for 5 minutes.

Heat oil in a small frying pan over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook for 4 minutes or until soft. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute. Stir in Vermouth, bring to the boil and cook for 4 minutes or until reduced by half.
Add saffron mixture and tomato. Cook for 5 minutes or until thick. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer to a bowl. Clean pan.
Melt butter in pan over medium heat. Add breadcrumbs. Cook, stirring often for 4 minutes or until golden. Transfer to a bowl. Stir in parmesan.

Preheat a barbecue grill with hood on medium heat. Place oysters on a baking tray. Spoon tomato mixture over oysters to cover. Sprinkle with breadcrumb mixture. Place on barbecue grill. Close hood. Cook for 5 minutes or until heated through. Transfer to a platter. Sprinkle with parsley and serve with lemon wedges.
